LanguageData.Dunmer_SettingGhostfenceReduceFuelWhenUs: Reduce Ghostfence pylon fuel when generating walls and self repairing
LanguageData.Dunmer_SettingGhostfenceReduceFuelAmount: Amount Ghostfence pylon fuel is decreased by when generating walls
LanguageData.Dunmer_SettingGhostfenceMaxDistance: The maximum distance between Ghostfence pylons, not including the pylons
LanguageData.Dunmer_SettingGhostfenceTicksPerCheck: The number of ticks between checks for Ghostfence pylons
LanguageData.Dunmer_SettingGhostfenceRepairMod: Modifier for the fuel consumed when self repairing walls and pylons
LanguageData.Dunmer_SettingGhostfenceWallLifespan: The lifespan of a wall segment once the Ghostfence is no longer considered valid
LanguageData.Dunmer_SettingMoragTongRaidForAll: Allow any humanlike faction to call upon the Morag Tong
LanguageData.Dunmer_SettingMoragTongRaidType: Enable the custom Morag Tong Raid arrival method, causing the Morag Tong to appear around your colony.
LanguageData.Dunmer_ResetMoragTong: Reset Morag Tong settings to default
